PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1993-18791993-10-040,  ,  ,  PMO, 
PrecisAppointment of the Honourable Horace Krever, a Judge of the Ontario Court of Appeal, as a Commissioner to review and report on the mandate, organization, management, operations, financing and regulation of all activities of the blood systems in Canada, including the events surrounding the contamination of the blood system in Canada in the early 1980s, by examining, without limiting the generality of the inquiry.
Attachments
